pr_title: Make FORM auth work with JPA security

timeline.message: Make FORM auth work with JPA security
Make FORM auth work with JPA security
Make FORM auth work with JPA security

timeline.bodyText: Are these all really required? https://quarkus.io/guides/security#form-based-authentication says they all have a default, except the encryption key, but IMO even that one could default to one generated at startup.
timeline.author: FroMage

replies.bodyText: I just copied from the existing test, you don't actually need all of them.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas
